description: Sandbox is a software consultancy at Northeastern creating robust and impactful software. Though just recently joined, I've become a technical lead for one of the projects working with the student government as the client, working on an event and attendance management web app. I believe my role as both tech lead and software developer has made great contributions for our group, as I'm happy to help others understand the tech stack - whether it's in the form of teaching or pair programming!

DAILP preserves indigenous language through a digital archive web app. I've worked on various features ranging from designing and building dynamic, interactive React components for editing Cherokee documents to developing GraphQL endpoints in Rust.
